00046 #ifndef _CONF_ACCESS_H_
00047 #define _CONF_ACCESS_H_
00048 
00049 // Active interface between MEMORIES and RAM (e.g. Embedded File System)
00050 #define  ACCESS_MEM_TO_RAM    DISABLE   // RAM to Mem I/O in control access
00051 
00052 // Active the Logical Unit
00053 #define  LUN_0                DISABLE   // On-Chip flash vitual memory
00054 #define  LUN_1                DISABLE   // Nand FLash
00055 #define  LUN_2                ENABLE    // Data Flash
00056 #define  LUN_3                DISABLE   // SD MMC
00057 #define  LUN_USB              DISABLE   // HOST mass storage memory
00058 
00059 #endif
